messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: SHIT WE MADE A BIG MISTAKE, 100 % NOT CODE GREEN!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: JUST... GOD THERES SO MANY. TRYING AND BUNKER DOWN. MORE DETAILS SOON

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Life signatures indicate they are already there....

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Arm up boys, take as many guns as you can

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Dont forget internals and a mask

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Everyone on the ferry, to the left when you come out

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Depart when ready.. and god speed

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Resupplies will be available at the ferry

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a number of rodents have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Eva. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Eva. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: GET TO A HIDING SPOT OR TO EVAC WERE GETIN THE FUCK OUT
